description: Summer’s here and it’s the perfect time to organise your hectic social calendar! Throughout June, July and August this site will give you everything you need to know about all the great events taking place across the UK.  With the Palm Pixi Plus, it’s easier than ever to stay connected this summer. With a fixed keyboard and a touchscreen, you can text, IM and browse your favourite websites and social networks in an instant. And, thanks to multi-tasking, you can keep all these apps open at once and flip between them, making it easy to organise your busy social life!  You won’t miss a thing when you get social this summer with the Palm Pixi Plus. Available exclusively on O2
